website_summaries.verdict: With its vivid screen, sturdy build, and sleek user interface, the Asus Vivo Tab RT is an excellent tablet in its own right -- but it can't beat the innovative Microsoft Surface RT.
pros: Asus' Vivo Tab RT features the Windows RT's elegant and refreshing user interface, has a bright and rich screen, and is equipped with a keyboard dock for maximizing productivity
cons: The Vivo Tab RT's keyboard is cramped, its operating system takes some time to get used to, and both its app store and Desktop interface are severely limited

customer_reviews.title: avoid
customer_reviews.text: This tablet is possibly one of the worst electronic devices I’ve worked with. It’s very, very slow to respond, the touch screen has dead spots, and sticky spots that when you touch them, they stay “on” resulting in the keyboard constantly entering values, or the screen constantly selecting options. I’ve had other Asus products that were very good, this is not good.
customer_reviews.author: David Y.

customer_reviews.title: Went bad after a year
customer_reviews.text: In the year that I had it, it was absolutely wonderful. The apps in the store were enough for me, and I loved putting PDFs of textbooks for school so I didn't have to lug then around everywhere. However within the past month the problem of "phantom touch" or "ghost touch" has popped up. Many other people have these problems, as I have found out online. I'm sad because this really was a wonderful tablet, but I will buy a new one from a different brand and hopefully it'll be as good as this one used to be.
customer_reviews.author: Kiran

customer_reviews.title: Glad I updated everything before writing a review!
customer_reviews.text: About 60 upgrades and multiple platform rebuilds and then update to 8.1 and were set in my preschool. The kids love doing lessons on these and they don't want to go back to paper... Oh well this is the electronic age. When I first got these I was frustrated because of the integrated flash in IE, but upgrades took care of this. Most of my time now is spent listening to "Look what I did" and multiple giggles as 3 kids on 3 of these plays/learns side by side. I think this was a great investment!
customer_reviews.author: K+kids

customer_reviews.title: Great For My Intended Use
customer_reviews.text: It works pretty good for my intended use; quick internet look-up's and web mail access. Downloads are painfully slow, it took 12 hours to download all of the Windows 8 RT / Office updates. I knew from the spec's what to expect and not to set those expectations too high. Windows RT is a different animal and takes some getting used to. For the price and my particular needs, this pad is great. If you need to run more hardware intense applications beyond internet and the preinstalled MS Office suite that comes with Windows RT, I recommend that you look at a higher end system.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Beesley

customer_reviews.title: Nice Tablet and great to carry around.
customer_reviews.text: The tablet is OK, but it has the typical Windows 8 issues. It has nice features and seems pretty fast for a tablet. I do not play games or do a lot of of other things besides basic functions so it is fine for me. The camera function takes nice photos. Microsoft offers applications that are not completely functional in that you wonder why the app only does part of a job, or in some cases seem almost useless. This is a problem with Microsoft, however, and not with the product which does perform great when Windows isn't hanging it up. I really do like it for the convenience and the nice display.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Yazell

customer_reviews.title: Loving this and a nice compromise from the Surface
customer_reviews.text: Yes, the resolution is a bit dated, but the overall fit and finish on this tablet is great. Comes with a glass cleaning cloth that eradicates all finger smears and such without solvent. One gripe though is that when the glass is spotless and there is a touch of humidity in the air, you do get some finger "drag" at times. Boots quickly and responds as expected to touch. I do experience some weird sporadic "sleep" habits, but maybe that's just my inability to understand the power settings for tablet-type devices. I can't really say anything bad about this.. especially at the price I paid.
customer_reviews.author: Robert!

customer_reviews.title: Solid device.  Super Fast Customer Service from ASUS.  Win RT needs work
customer_reviews.text: Honestly, I like the tablet a lot! This is the sleekest Windows RT tablet out there but most won't know that it even exists. Regarding the free keyboard, ASUS customer service was super responsive to my questions and the keyboard dock itself arrived in about a week's time. WinRT is nice but has a ways to go before it can seriously compete with iOS and Android. MS Office may not be enough for most people to keep them from selecting a competing tab. With the Nexus 10 having superior specs and priced at $399, most RT tabs seem painfully overpriced for what's currently offered. Microsoft gets a C+ for RT and Asus gets an A for hardware and customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Blackorchid

customer_reviews.title: Lots of features for the price
customer_reviews.text: I upgraded from an android tablet to this. The RT version of Windows 8 is slightly different from the version on my stationary computer, but nothing to really complain about. I would have given it 5 stars except the touch screen sometimes, for no reason that I can see, changes from landscape to portrait view. This happens even when it is docked and setting on a hard surface. No comment back from tech support.
customer_reviews.author: Aazyzx

customer_reviews.title: We like it
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this windows tablet as a replacement for another similar Asus tablet that met a bitter end (cracked screen). I was impressed with how the Windows tablets always perform better than the android tablets although the androids are getting better all the time and are generally cheaper. I like that this particular Windows model was loaded with Office and Flash Player. The only problem we ran into is that the Wi-Fi was not able to pick up router signals as strongly as our previous tablet. But generally speaking, its a good deal for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Sean

customer_reviews.title: A nice Windows RT tablet
customer_reviews.text: After using this tablet for a few weeks I'm even more convinced that Microsoft is making a mistake by combining its desktop and tablet operating systems. While Windows 8 is awful on a desktop (or even notebook) PC, it absolutely shines on a tablet. It's unfortunate that more developers haven't created apps to support RT. Pros: - Windows RT is a very good OS for a *tablet* - Hardware is thin and light and feels solid overall - Micro SD slot for storing movies, music, etc. Cons: - Occasionally crashes when coming out of sleep - Lack of quality apps in app store
customer_reviews.author: Chuck

customer_reviews.title: Bait and Switch
customer_reviews.text: The box has been opened, there is no dock and the tab is the wifi only model and not the 3G version. The serial number matches the box and the original box label says its the wifi model. That label has stuck over with a new label that says 3G but this is not 3G. Nothing reconciles with the description of the item. As this is priced like a wifi model without a dock I have to assume this was an intentional bait and switch by this vendor.
customer_reviews.author: Phil Neil

customer_reviews.title: It was great, but I am not made for small computers
customer_reviews.text: It was a great computer and gave it to my mom to use, which she uses as an e-reader and her first computer. I need wide keyboard for my long paper works. I didnt have any issues with it, which I thought I would have had to buy a keyboarder later on, had one in the package, which was very cool and saved me an extra 150.00 when looking at it. It moved great for the two weeks I used it, and still use it to play the games on it, that I downloaded. If you don't mind small keyboards you will love it.
customer_reviews.author: helene lauzier

customer_reviews.title: I like it a lot!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because it was Asus and I have a couple of their other tablets. I was curious about the new Windows RT OS. So far the tablet is perfect and has great battery life. I got the free keyboard very fast, 1 week. Windows RT is pretty good. New apps are being added every day. I was able to find the apps I use most on my Android tablet in the Windows store. Overall, very happy with this purchase and would recommend it. As always, Amazon delivered on time!
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: ASUS unit gives a run for the money!
customer_reviews.text: I gave it an Its Okay rating because although this a well built tablet/laptop, I think that the tablet to keyboard feature could have been designed a little better for easier customer usage...maybe a flip-back or twist around type of display. It is troublesome in connecting and disconnecting the display especially while travelling. Then you have to look for somewhere to store the keyboard being that there's no applicable case in the market that will accommodate both. And the Windows 8 RT really sucks! Very limited in apps that can be downloaded. Should been Android OS Loaded. But compared to the MS Surface, I think this little monster will give Surface a run for the money!
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: A great buy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a refurb. When I opened it I was thrilled to find that It looked perfect. Not a mark on it. The unit is easy to use, pictures are very clear and have great color balance. The touch screen is awesome and couldn't work better. Over all the tablet is everything it claimed to be. I'm not a fan of windows 8.1 but the OS is functioning well for what it is.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: You would not believe how long and how many times I mulled over this for two reasons one iPad or Windows well first I didn't want a social media machine so that eliminated the iPad. then there was which Windows machine (manufacturer) i wanted I have had and have several Asus computers and have been very happy with them now it comes to price I was lucky to catch it at a very competitive price. I use it for everything now work and a little entertainment. Great item. Would recommend it to anyone wanting a real computer in a tablet.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Good by itself, but has problems with the attached vivotab keyboard.
customer_reviews.text: This seemed like a good tablet at first however when connected to the vivotab keyboard, it constantly fell into the sleep of death. The sleep of death is when I would put the tablet into standby, though the tablet would actually shut completely off. Turning it back on was the hard part as it I would press the power button several times and still it would not turn back on unless I somehow got lucky. It works perfectly on it's own, but not with the vivotab keyboard attached.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding
customer_reviews.text: With the mount, this thing practically never runs out of battery. It functions nearly flawlessly, the Windows RT is much, MUCH better than iOS and Android. It comes with Microsoft Office, and there are plenty of free apps to download. I sold this item to purchase a tablet that had the full Windows 8 OS so I could use normal .exe files... but I did very much love the VivoTab RT TF600T while I had it, which was for about 1 month. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Hyperiox

customer_reviews.title: It's been a great tool
customer_reviews.text: I really like this tablet. It is easy to use and incorporates Windows very nicely. It is also great that Asus gave the free keyboard. The major con is that Windows is horrible for apps. They don't have anything. They also have issues with google maps and such which says they are not investing in Windows. Lastly, I wish they could just have Facebook and not the Friends program. It is confusing and doesn't allow you to save photos. Those cons are basically the operating system, not the tablet itself which I've enjoyed!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ASUS..............Say no More
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this tablet............Do yourself a favor though and get the ASUS docking keyboard that goes with it. It makes a world of difference and works fantastic. Turns your ASUS tablet into a laptop. You really can't tell the difference. Windows 8RT takes a little getting used to, but all new OS do..........Have fun. You'll love this tablet.
customer_reviews.author: J. Eden

customer_reviews.title: Pretty cool
customer_reviews.text: I love the size and windows opperating system. But its not as fast as i had hoped. It randomly turns apps off as well as shuts down and the video graphs arent good. Its choppy and distorted when recording a video. I think the frames per sec or whatever isnt very high. I do love that it came with windows office and thats its like a computer. Just wish it was faster.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica R Ledesma

customer_reviews.title: ASUS VivoTab RT TF600T
customer_reviews.text: Great Product. Easy to set up. Love that Office 2013 comes with it. Only problem is now my daughter wants it over her ipad. Lucky for me her school requires the ipad. Still getting used to Windows 8, but it is a good product so far. Wish it had the At Bat app for listening to games.
customer_reviews.author: becca wilson

customer_reviews.title: Amazing for the price
customer_reviews.text: I bought a VivoTab RT for my wife as a Christmas present. She loves it. The VivoTab RT is very quick and responsive. It is much better than other tablets at the $200 price range. It's cooler than the Kindle and much more useful. The VivoTab RT is not a laptop replacement. It's a fun toy. If you would like something more like a laptop be aware that you can find Windows 8 tablets for not much more. The Windows 8 tablets can actually run 'programs' instead of 'apps'. The VivoTab RT cannot run 'programs'.
customer_reviews.author: Will

customer_reviews.title: These have a problem - buyer beware
customer_reviews.text: I liked it when it very much when it worked. But after one year of light use it has what I see online is a chronic problem of ghost touch and now does not work at all. Asus is no help when I contact them, even though many other people have same problem. I have contacted them several times and still do not understand how to even pay for a repair. Very disappointed. I have two other Asus laptops in the family - but will no longer buy any due to problem and lack of correction. Too expensive to stop working after 13 months.
customer_reviews.author: krh

customer_reviews.title: Nice tablet
customer_reviews.text: This is a good tablet. I like the screen size and the tablets capabilities. I just wish that it had a built in USB port instead of having to use the charging port. Limited to using only RT apps and internet explorer. Unable to add other virus protection or popup blockers. Windows defender just does not cut it.
customer_reviews.author: paparon9

customer_reviews.title: downloaded all of the updates and there wasn't any problems setting it up and it runs great. Also updated it to Windows 10 OS
customer_reviews.text: It was in the new unopened box as it was stated by the sellers. Charge it up, downloaded all of the updates and there wasn't any problems setting it up and it runs great. Also updated it to Windows 10 OS.
customer_reviews.author: n/n

customer_reviews.title: This is my first tablet and I am very pleased with it
customer_reviews.text: This is my first tablet and I am very pleased with it. I bought during the warehouse sale. this was either used or returned but it is in excellent condition. I had some trouble at the beginning learning my way around the commands and Windows RT. Also, when I checked for updates I discovered there were over 70 of them! Once that was done, things went much smoother. Like I said, I am very please with my "new" tablet.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry Bow

customer_reviews.title: No one unless you love getting the runaround
customer_reviews.text: Don't buy tablets over the internet. Who are you going to call with problems? No one unless you love getting the runaround. so went to best-buy and bought a different brand. I was on a time crunch as I was going on a month trip.
customer_reviews.author: CJ

customer_reviews.title: Not even worth the great price
customer_reviews.text: I ended up returning it because it turned completely off every time it went to sleep and then the power button had to be pushed numerous times before it would power back on. I didn't care for it enough to bother with getting it replaced. I bought it because it was such a great price for a tablet with Microsoft Office, but that benefit didn't make up for the limited selection in the Microsoft app store.
customer_reviews.author: Steph

customer_reviews.title: Do not go for this tablet.
customer_reviews.text: Worst item I've ever bought. Had troubles with this and the dock since I bought them. As for today, I cannot make my VivoTab RT work with Windows 8.1, it hangs up when enters sleep mode, has ghosts touches and freezes until you reboot. Of course... you can't downgrade from 8.1 to 8. Looked up in the web, there's many of us with this problems and no response nether from Asus or Microsoft. Also, not as much applications to install. I seriously recommend buying another tablet.
customer_reviews.author: Javier L.

customer_reviews.title: Faulty Keyboard interface
customer_reviews.text: The unit has a problem with the keyboard interface. Certain letters, "K", "P" "L" and a few others code to the wrong response. I have tried other keyboards, and the problem is with the Tablet. It probably a miss-connection with connector interface. Otherwise, the Tablet works fine, and I am generally pleased. I just wish the whole system worked.
customer_reviews.author: Audrey M

customer_reviews.title: The idea of this product is great! It work to my expectations for a few ...
customer_reviews.text: The idea of this product is great! It work to my expectations for a few months. The touch and/or the keyboard become unresponsive, so I had to restart it multiple times while working with it, which was driving me nuts. I sent it in for warranty, they sent it just as it was. IT'S SLOW. There's nothing to do about it. I haven't used this tablet in weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Mujer maravilla

customer_reviews.title: ASUS VivoTab RT Tablet
customer_reviews.text: Daughter loves this! She purchased it with her own money and is using this Tablet for college homework. Very responsive, wireless, works great at home or at school. Of course, it's a lot lighter than lugging around her laptop, but she still uses her laptop for long storage of documents. Extremely pleased with the quality and functionality of this Tablet.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce Bowman

customer_reviews.title: Great Tablet, Great Price, Quad Core Processor and Very Fast.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great starter tablet! The display is bright and very clear; even in full sun. The battery life is good even with heavy use. I also purchased the keyboard docking station at the same time and I'm glad I did. The docking station has built in batteries that will recharge the tablet and give you another 9 hours of operation. I highly recommend buying both and am very pleased with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Radio.Flyer

customer_reviews.title: I like the Windows operating system and the screen resolution quality ...
customer_reviews.text: I like the Windows operating system and the screen resolution quality and function, but there are too many hardware issues. It also is very hard to find replacement cables that actually work, leaving the tablet without battery power and unusable. From now on I'll stick with tablets with micro-USB ports.
customer_reviews.author: J B

customer_reviews.title: handles all internet functions easily..
customer_reviews.text: this was well worth the price... handles all internet functions easily.... streams movies and music with ease... plenty of apps for me... but I admit I am not an app hound..... it will not replace your laptop or desktop... but seriously makes the time in front of those much less.... I have upgraded to WIN 8.1 with no issues and was free...
customer_reviews.author: JOEL D ANDERSON

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking tablet with a touchscreen that starts showing multiple ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking tablet with a touchscreen that starts showing multiple press points eventually locking you out of your device. I bought it 4 years ago. It had 18 good months.
customer_reviews.author: R. Grela

customer_reviews.title: This tablet was acting like there was something touching it in the upper right ...
customer_reviews.text: This tablet was acting like there was something touching it in the upper right hand corner and made it extremely difficult to even login to my account the plastic over the antennas was always cracking and chipping under the slightest stress your better off going with a Microsoft surface RT way better
customer_reviews.author: Marshal pool

customer_reviews.title: Great tablet!
customer_reviews.text: This tablet is amazing! It does everything my laptop does. I like that I can use Microsoft Windows on it as well as print wireless from it. I also purchased the keyboard and the tablet snaps right into the keyboard and is like a mini laptop. I enjoy taking pictures with it and sharing them immediately with friends.
customer_reviews.author: Athena Dedrick

customer_reviews.title: I am very happy with mine
customer_reviews.text: A very light weight but quite enjoyable machine. It has an optional keyboard that adds battery life and the memory is upgradable via a micro SD card. The sound is made for a private personal use and not loud enough to hear across the room (If you want that). I am very happy with mine.
customer_reviews.author: H Tadesse

customer_reviews.title: never buy this product
customer_reviews.text: never bye asus product. this is my second tablet. both of them have issue same issue. after using for 6 months, i found they have screen related issue. you can see the bubble (its like screen has three four cursors clicking points without touching the screen) on screen. also, when i called them to cover it under the warranty, they asked me to pay for shipment. i would not make such comment on any product, but since i am having this issue in my both TF600t. i thought i should warned buyers. if you have the problem in one tablet, it might be accepted. when you have same issue in similar tablet, it is product issue.
customer_reviews.author: harsh

customer_reviews.title: nice tablet
customer_reviews.text: It took me a little to get used to windows Rt, but once you do you realize it is a very intelligent OS. The Asus quality is superb, the only flow with the tablet are the speakers which are located on the back rather than in front....even though your hands can redirect the sound to the front and add some acoustic to it.
customer_reviews.author: Roberto Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn't recommend for someone with limited computer troubleshooting knowledge
customer_reviews.text: Bought here on Amazon and have been using for over a year. Has had several glitches I've had to work through requiring moderate computer knowledge to figure out. Wouldn't recommend for someone with limited computer troubleshooting knowledge. Great bang for the buck though, I use it every day at school.
customer_reviews.author: Jake

customer_reviews.title: Good tablet
customer_reviews.text: I don't love the Window RT system, so do some research before you purchase. I would have rather had Android. The quality of the tablet is great and I still use it, just not overly user friendly. Overall, Asus has built a great product, but the RT operating system was a mistake in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Terilynne

customer_reviews.title: Great Tablet
customer_reviews.text: I love this tablet and use it for everything! Priced was excellent, and product performance is super! I'm a big Windows fan, and this tablet made transition from my laptop easy. Interfaces with my phone, came loaded with Microsoft Office, and has data card access if you need more space. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: mnRN

customer_reviews.title: GREAT
customer_reviews.text: WONDERFUL TABLET AT A FANTASTIC PRICE. I HAD ORDERED AND RETURNED OTHERS DUE TO LACK OF INSTRUCTION OR HELP ON HOW TO USE. THIS ONE IS PERFECT FOR A GREAT-GRANDMOTHER LIKE MYSELF. CAN DO MOST EVERYTHING I DO ON MY LAPTOP, BUT MUCH MORE CONVENIENT TO THROW IN MY PURSE OR GYM BAG AND TAKE WITH ME. I LOVE IT.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: very sad panda was only reason i got this was to ...
customer_reviews.text: eh, just got mine my biggest dissapointment was meerly human error but i thought i could play hearthstone on it but no,.... very sad panda was only reason i got this was to pl;ay hearthstone and it says it not compatible so... =/ oh well it's fine for what it is otherwise tho
customer_reviews.author: robert joseph brevard

customer_reviews.title: Asus Vivo Tab
customer_reviews.text: This is a really nice tablet. The picture on it is better than the most popular brand. The only downside is that you can't just download the games you want. You have to go through the app store for anything, which limits you on what you can have on your personal tablet.
customer_reviews.author: Margie

customer_reviews.title: Great Tablet
customer_reviews.text: This is my first review and I must say that I like the VivoTab so far. I haven't had any issues with it. I have even ordered the free mobile dock from Asus (although I'm still waiting for it). However, there are two issues that I have with this tablet. The apps from the Microsoft Store does not compare to those from Apple and Google. Hopefully Microsoft will resolve this matter quickly. And to the day, I purchased this tablet a month ago for $479. Now Amazon is selling it for $377. I'm a little disgruntled about paying a hundred dollars more, but I know that's how technology retail work sometimes. But overall, I am satisfied with my purchase....
customer_reviews.author: Tameka Davis

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: I had an ipad and it got stolen. I loved the ipad and swoarn to be an apple user for life. I was sold by the dock that you can purchase separately.. And being able to put in a SD card and a USB cord. I don't like that Windows doesn't have all the apps that Android and Apple has. You always have to get third party apps and sometimes even those aren't as good. That's the only thing that sucks about it. Other than that... it's such a cool toy. I've had it for about a month and I'm still finding new things to love about it.
customer_reviews.author: Shontai

customer_reviews.title: Wife can't stop talking about this!
customer_reviews.text: My wife is a teacher and LOVES her tablet. We have tried several things that would allow her to take notes and do other things as she moves around the class. This is the first practical product to accomplish it. She raves about the Windows 8 layout and ease of use. She took 3 pages of notes in Word (yes, it comes with Office) all on the screen keyboard. We are waiting for the physical keyboard now, but at this point she really, really can't stop talking about how much she loves this!
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Everything I expected.
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with every aspect of this product. It is well made, compact yet powerful, user friendly for me, has plenty of apps (for now) and a great value for the price, which included the free docking keyboard. I bought this product because I wanted the convenience of a tablet, but mainly for its Microsoft compatibility. The free docking keyboard was icing on the cake. I am willing to wait for more apps, which I know will come.
customer_reviews.author: Terry D Hardin

customer_reviews.title: Great Windows Tablet
customer_reviews.text: This computer seems much more powerful than most tablets. It runs windows RT and comes loaded with Microsoft Office, besides the normal contingent of tablet apps. The tablet and keyboard are really well designed, with a combined battery charge of about 16 hours. The USB port and memory slot are key productivity enhancements.
customer_reviews.author: W. Bode

customer_reviews.title: THANK GOD Not an Ipad
customer_reviews.text: Everything I was looking for and more. I am in no way computer savvy, and I thought windows RT/8 would be a lot harder to get used to as I came from an Ipad. It's so nice and fast too. I truly feel that I can do it all with this Asus vivotab RT. I don't know what else to say except, I spend over 6 months checking all of them out. This is my new baby.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: I debated getting an iPad, since I have an iPhone, but I couldn't say no to this price. I got more GB and paid at least 200 less. Plus it comes loaded with office products. I bought this for business and I liked not having to spend extra for the office apps the way I would have with an iPad.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Longo

customer_reviews.title: Touch Screen Went Bonkers
customer_reviews.text: Less than a year later the touch screen went bonkers. It thinks the screen is being touched sporadically in different places. Other wise it was a great tablet until then.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Gross

customer_reviews.title: Best Value for Money Tablet
customer_reviews.text: With windows rt, and everything awesome that comes with it, this tablet automatically becomes much more productive and useful than the iPads or the Android tablets. And with the price and capability of having a proper functional dock, it becomes the best windows rt tablet out there.... Definitely need more apps though.
customer_reviews.author: YK

customer_reviews.title: Asus tablet vivo RT
customer_reviews.text: First tablet that I have ever owned, very easy to use, very light wieght. With the on screen keyboard you don't need an external keyboard attached. This came with the MS office 2013 which I can't wait for the full version to be released.
customer_reviews.author: Gail

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my father for christmas. Its extremely light and very clear. Haven't heard anything bad about it from my father... so there couldn't be too much wrong with it!
customer_reviews.author: Kris

customer_reviews.title: Was not new open pacaged as indicated in the listing
customer_reviews.text: I like my Tablet very much, However the person who sold it,listed as New but open package and it wasn't, It was used and its crashed on me 5 times already. And hard to get that button to start it up. The battery charge don't last as long as it should. I have the dock and it says with the dock its like 16 hours battery life.. um no its only like 7 hours. so IDK. I like it and stuck with it.. Just wished the sellers would be honest about the product.
customer_reviews.author: Marleen Verduzco

customer_reviews.title: It's a very cool Tab
customer_reviews.text: The tab y very light, thin and has a very nice design. the Windows 8 RT runs very smooth and fast also, you can use it as tablet or as a netbook if you buy the complementary keyboard. Asus always was a brand who makes very good hardware, so you should really consider to buy this product.
customer_reviews.author: Raul

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Tablet!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome Tablet! Wasn't sure about a Win 8.1 Tablet, but I love it. Fast and with plenty of storage. A+++ on this tablet from me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love this tablet it is my go to travel computer
customer_reviews.text: I love this tablet it is my go to travel computer. It has all of the microsoft word products, and after 2 years I still use it and it still works fast and well for me.
customer_reviews.author: isabella

customer_reviews.title: it's very slowly to do my work
customer_reviews.text: I don't like it because it has some problems 1. Flash doesn't work. 2. Sometimes it's very slowly. 3. I cannot download any programs or setup like printer or other. 4. They didn't write the operation for windows is 32 bit because I'm looking for 64 bit. Please, if you look for buy any things bee clear for all information. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Mohammed Al Haddad

customer_reviews.title: I would not recommend this tablet for anybody
customer_reviews.text: A gift for mother in law and failed in less than three(3)weeks. I would not recommend this tablet for anybody...even a mother in law.
customer_reviews.author: T.J. F

customer_reviews.title: Got my money's worth, all right...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the one without the physical keyboard/battery extension attachment to save money, but when it came in, it DID have the attachment. Talk about getting my money's worth. It's a good little tablet.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob Stamm

customer_reviews.title: has worked great for my wife we don't use the desktop computer ...
customer_reviews.text: has worked great for my wife we don't use the desktop computer any more I would get a tablet before I would get a laptop for ease of use.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: 2 tablets in a row that have failed
customer_reviews.text: While one was refurb'd and stuck in a firmware upgrade loop, the second one I bought was (supposedly) brand new and the thing would not charge. This is the 3rd unit I have had total, and while ASUS normally has top notch stuff this equipment is pathetically horrid. I am now stuck waiting another week or two to get my $575 dollars back on the two units I had to return because Amazon ships back to their warehouse ground shipping. Thanks ASUS for a terrible experience. Sadly I own the keyboard dock for one of these so I am going to have to keep trying to get a unit that actually works.
customer_reviews.author: Maverick494

customer_reviews.title: tablet headline
customer_reviews.text: I ratedthe tablet and gave it a five star because it has everything on it just like a normal size computer and it is small at the same time given me the ability to carry it with me where ever I go.
customer_reviews.author: eric j jones

customer_reviews.title: Great latptop replacement and it comes with Office!
customer_reviews.text: My PCs are for gaming, and all I needed was a browsing/word doc device. This tablet is perfect! Comes with office, never lags and Windows 8 is awesome on a touch device! For apps, office and browsing, this replacement my casual laptop easily.
customer_reviews.author: Robert J Good

customer_reviews.title: A great tablet
customer_reviews.text: I love this tablet. I've been having so much fun getting to know the Windows 8 RT interface and although there's a learning curve, I find the actions make sense and are well thought out by the developers. The only downfall is the lack of apps in the Microsoft Store but I'm hoping that will improve very soon. I would definately recommend this tablet as well as the keyboard touchpad battery, which turns the tablet into a functional laptop and doubles the battery life.
customer_reviews.author: Joanne Malbon

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: unit is great, but I had trouble with hooking it to a keyboard. lucky for me I had another to try and it hooked up a lot better. I believe it to be in the tablet because the other I bought had no problems. all else so far has been great.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Blais

customer_reviews.title: Can't go wrong with the price
customer_reviews.text: I bought this tablet because i needed a new note book that wasn't too heavy and so far the tablet is getting me what I need for homework and lesson preparation.
customer_reviews.author: Pheng

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied with my item.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent time, quick answer, and item as described. I'll check other items from your store.
customer_reviews.author: Jhonny B. Good.

customer_reviews.title: Asus VivoTab RT 10"
customer_reviews.text: We had this tablet less than a month and had to return it to Asus for repair. We had it back 4 days and it went belly up again. Returned to Amazon and bought a Kindle Fire.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra and John Hassman

customer_reviews.title: Tends to have difficulty awakening from the sleep mode. ...
customer_reviews.text: Tends to have difficulty awakening from the sleep mode. I usually need to restart the unit in order for it to operate properly.
customer_reviews.author: GSA

customer_reviews.title: The tablet was already configured with a user/password. and ...
customer_reviews.text: The tablet was already configured with a user/password. and trying to format it did not work. I would never use this seller again.
customer_reviews.author: A. kanso

customer_reviews.title: Great tablet for the price!
customer_reviews.text: ASUS builds great products and I am please with the quality of my VIVO Tab. I haven't had any problems. I admit that I like the Metro RT UI and it looks good on the hi-res screen. Also I bought this RT model because it included an upgrade to MS Office and that product is optimized (larger buttons, for example) for the touchscreen experience.
customer_reviews.author: Dwaine

customer_reviews.title: Must buy
customer_reviews.text: It's great I have all the Microsoft programs I need for work and for school. I can make a presentation and email it to my boss and he will be able to watch the presentation from the board room. I love it and plus you get all the new Microsoft 2013 programs.
customer_reviews.author: Daunte Aponte

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: It's ok because it constantly gets system updates and it takes forever to upgrade its os and reboot itself.
customer_reviews.author: TYLER WUCHUNTA

customer_reviews.title: Got a lemon.....
customer_reviews.text: I've always heard good things about Asus, however, this tablet purchased in Dec 2014 was sent for repair Aug 2015 and again in July 2016. Now deemed too costly to repair by warranted company. Waiting on final resolution. Frustrated.
customer_reviews.author: Cheri Broeker

customer_reviews.title: Everything was okay
customer_reviews.text: Every thing was okay volume did not work but was fully refunded for the return of tablet. Did like the tablet
customer_reviews.author: Sarah M.

customer_reviews.title: Nice Product
customer_reviews.text: Bought two of these for my grandchildren who are home schooling. They can't put them down. Bought keyboards too.
customer_reviews.author: zeusarrow

customer_reviews.title: Great tablet!
customer_reviews.text: I am really enjoying this tablet. I like the operating system and it's ease of use. Took it to a conference to take notes in workshops and it was wonderful!
customer_reviews.author: Victoria B.

customer_reviews.title: windows rt
customer_reviews.text: This is a fast tablet and finally allows for me to use the Windows Office that I know and love. Very light and great screen.
customer_reviews.author: jackal

customer_reviews.title: Best Tablet ever bought!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this tablet for ministry purposes. It is a great tablet! It is literally a tiny computer! The tablet is very easy to navigate, and the keyboard was a great add feature! I would recommend this to anyone looking for an affordable portable computer!
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda A

customer_reviews.title: beyond expectations
customer_reviews.text: I had one problem, which was not the system. I forgot that you need a microsoft account, like hotmail. otherwise easy navigation and great features.
customer_reviews.author: JAN G.

customer_reviews.title: The Tablet of the times
customer_reviews.text: Great tablet...I am new to windows 8...but I am quickly learning. the apps.I have always worked on apple i-pad...but now i am a windows 8 person.
customer_reviews.author: Vette

customer_reviews.title: I love it
customer_reviews.text: I love this tablet ! It's like a mini portable computer, now i don't have to go on my PC to take pics from my camera to my phone. Great tablet
customer_reviews.author: Dashley

customer_reviews.title: It's okay.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this tablet because of it's ability to operate Excel. It works but requires a fair amount of patience. Some thing that I didn't consider is how difficult it is to complete Excel functions using a touch pad. I have also had several issues with the device crashing and in many cases the apps that I downloaded do not work properly. If you're used to an iPad, it's going to take a while to figure out this device.
customer_reviews.author: Abbey

customer_reviews.title: Works great.
customer_reviews.text: It surfs the web no problem, touch screen works like a dream. very fast, bluetooth works awesome, wifi works great. The only problem is it's RT. Cant install 3rd party software unless it comes from the store, and struggles to handle highly intensive flash games
customer_reviews.author: Andy Tran

customer_reviews.title: wonderful
customer_reviews.text: How did we ever live before without the ease of computers or tablets? Now that i have it, i never want to live without it. Thanks for have a super product
customer_reviews.author: BRITT EVANS

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY THIS PRODUCT. IT STOPPED WORKING in 3 months.
customer_reviews.author: Happy2412

customer_reviews.title: Okay product!
customer_reviews.text: This is a good tablet the fact it has windows 8 is better then the more expensive ones that don't. The down side of this one is when you comew out of sleep mode the apps flicker like it's going out then you must reset the the device or turn it off. I'm not sure if their all that way but this one is, Asus techs are helping out with problem.
customer_reviews.author: McKinley Pearce

customer_reviews.title: Awesome tablet!
customer_reviews.text: This was a great purchase! I use it everyday and rarely use my laptop now. I purchased the keyboard/battery and have consistent 16 hours of use. I absolutely love this tablet!
customer_reviews.author: KENNETH R MCCONNELL

customer_reviews.title: Good product -- no product support
customer_reviews.text: Very good product with few negatives. Product support worse than bad. Hidden support phone numbers. Nobody with answers. Outdated website and phone menus that don't mention this newer product. Have not received promised dock/keyboard. Terrible support makes you consider returning this very fine product.
customer_reviews.author: Rodney L. Roberson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with the product look for more items in the future
customer_reviews.author: james w. green

customer_reviews.title: Great Tablet with Free-Dock Station
customer_reviews.text: I really like general design of the tablet. It could be more lighter but it is still one of the lightest tablet with respect to its size. I find windows RT very responsive. If you use computers for only browsing and document editing, asus vivo rt would be a great choice. I expect low number of applications in the store will sharply increase in a short time. With Dock station it is something like a good netbook.
customer_reviews.author: ismet

customer_reviews.title: The tablet itself it probably just fine. It was bought as a gift for my ...
customer_reviews.text: The tablet itself it probably just fine. It was bought as a gift for my Mother who has vision problems, and it just didn't work for her. I am now having problems returning it. It was purchased a month ago, and I am still trying to get this resolved.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great tablet... but
customer_reviews.text: I think windows 8 RT needs a bit more tweaking. It is good for common tasks like email and web surfing, but the apps are limited. the MS store needs more apps, games etc. The design of the tablet is flawless, except for the charging cable, in my opinion it should be a standard Micro USB. Instead ASUS uses a proprietary connector, so you can't leave the cable at home. Tablet has the habit of going unresponsive, it doesnt happen often, but it happens more frequently than I expect. Battery life and screen resolution good. Bottom line, for the price, a good solid tablet.
customer_reviews.author: John Mojica

product_meta.title: ASUS VivoTab RT TF600T-B1-GR 10.1-Inch 32 GB Tablet (Gray) 2012 Model
product_meta.description:
Size:32 GB(VIVO RT) TF600T-B1-GR, Grey, 10.1" HD (1366x768) Super IPS+, OGS Touch Panel, Outdoor Readable Mode, NVIDIA Tegra 3 (1.3GHz), 2GB DDR3, NVIDIA Tegra 3, 32GB Flash, N/A, Win RT, 802.11BGN, 2MP & 8MP, 1 Year North America Warranty

AMAZON.COM




FROM THE MANUFACTURER
 


ASUS AND YOU
INCREDIBLE TOGETHER
With a name inspired by the Latin verb "to live", Vivo is designed as a constant companion that blends the familiar elegance of ASUS tablet design with Microsoft's Windows RT.

The ASUS VivoTab RT is designed with both work and play in mind. Get more done, enjoy new experiences and connect with others in exciting new ways.

ASUS VivoTab RT and YOU. Incredible Together.

TRIED AND TESTED FOR QUALITY
ASUS is a global technology leader who focuses on the mastery of innovation and design perfection. Today, it is the world's #1 manufacturer of motherboards and is one of world's top PC brands. With customers' need in the forefront, ASUS embodies the passion to create products that truly enhance the computing experience. Not only does design matter, ASUS products are also strictly quality tested to surpass industry standards, surviving multiple drop tests, hinge tests cycles and LCD pressure tests to name a few, ensuring that every ASUS product you buy will be one of your best investments.

RELIABILITY MATTERS
ASUS PCs finish near or at the top of the industry's reliability rankings survey after survey.1

Known for their unmatched reliability, ASUS products clearly offers you peace of mind and quality you can trust. Using only premium materials, ASUS aims to break the industry mold and deliver a product that is truly incredible.

KEY FEATURES
 * 10.1" HD (1366x768) Super IPS+, OGS Touch Panel, Outdoor Readable Mode 
 * Powered by NVIDIA Tegra 3 Quad-core processor for best web experience with up to two times faster browsing, and console-quality gaming
 * Ultra-slim and light (0.33" thin and 1.16lbs light) with metallic finish design
 * 2MP front camera and 8MP auto-focus rear camera with flash, back-illuminated CMOS sensor, and large aperture design to clearly capture every moment
 * Optional Docking station with Full QWERTY keyboard adds additional 7 hours of battery life, to instantly turn the VivoTab RT into PC mode with up to 16 hours of battery life.2

SPECIFICATIONS
 * Operating System: Windows RT
 * Display: 10.1" HD Super IPS+ panel with 1366 x 768 resolution, OGS Touch panel: 10 fingers multi-touch and outdoor readable mode
 * Processor: NVIDIA Tegra 3 Quad-core processor (1.3GHz)
 * Wireless: 802.11 b/g/n
 * Bluetooth: BT 4.0
 * Memory: 2GB DDR3 (1500MHz) LP
 * Storage: 32GB or 64GB Flash
 * Camera: 2 megapixel (front); 8.0 megapixel (Rear)
 * Card Reader: Micro SD (SDXC)
 * Speakers: Built-in Stereo speakers
 * Input/ Output:  * 1 x Internal Microphone
    * 1 x Headphone-out / Mic-in
    * 1 x Micro HDMI port
   
   
 * Others: G-Sensor, E-Compass, GPS, Light Sensor, Gyroscope, NFC Ready 
 * Battery: Polymer 25W/h, up to 9 hours2 
 * Dimensions: 10.33" x 6.73" x 0.33" (W x D x H)
 * Weight: 1.16lbs (with battery)
 * Color: Grey

WHAT'S IN THE BOX
 * ASUS VivoTab RT Tablet
 * AC Adapter
 * Warranty Information Card


2Battery life varies depending on usage conditions



See more
